price: ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߫ ߖߊ߬ߕߋ߬ߓߐ ߓߘߊ߫ ߛߎ߬ߘߎ߲߬ߧߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߊ߲߬ߓߐߣߍ߲ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ߣߍ߲ ߦߋ߫
arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: iq'taraba lilnnāsi ḥisābuhum wahum fī ghaflatin muʿ'riḍūna
